name: Football Prediction
description: The Football Prediction API provides predictions for upcoming football matches, average bookie odds, results for past matches and prediction performance statistics for past results.

api_methods.name: Head To Head
api_methods.description: Shows head to head stats and previous encounters for the home and away team of an upcoming match.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: (use predictions endpoint to get list of IDs)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the search to only X previous encounters. (max is 10)

utterances.utterance: Can you show me the head-to-head stats for the upcoming match between Manchester United and Liverpool?
I want to see the previous encounters for the Chelsea vs Arsenal match.
Give me the head-to-head history for the Real Madrid and Barcelona game, but limit it to the last 5 matches.
Show me the past matchups for the Bayern Munich vs Borussia Dortmund game.
I'd like to know the head-to-head results for the AC Milan and Inter Milan match, with a limit of 3 previous games.
What are the head-to-head stats for the Paris Saint-Germain vs Marseille match?
Can you provide the head-to-head details for the Juventus and Napoli game, but only for the last 7 encounters?
I'd like to see the head-to-head record for the Tottenham Hotspur vs Manchester City match.
Show me the head-to-head stats for the Atletico Madrid vs Sevilla game, limited to the last 2 matches.
What are the previous match results for the Ajax vs Feyenoord match?

api_methods.name: Home Team League Stats
api_methods.description: Shows the league table and stats for the home team of an upcoming match.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: (use predictions endpoint to get list of IDs)

I want to know the league stats for the home team in the match with ID 99001.

api_methods.name: Prediction Details
api_methods.description: Grab all available predictions for a match id

api_methods.name: List available federations
api_methods.description: Returns an array of all the available federations.

utterances.utterance: Can you show me all the football federations available?
List all the federations in the football prediction database.

Could you provide a list of all available football federations?
Tell me about the federations you have predictions for.

Show me the federations that are part of your football predictions.
Which federations can I get predictions for?
Give me a list of federations available in your football prediction API.

api_methods.name: Performance stats for past predictions
api_methods.description: Returns information about the accuracy of past predictions. (in the last day, 7 days, 14 days and 30 days) Can be additionally filtered by federation and market. If no market filter is provided it defaults to classic

parameters.name: market
parameters.description: Show stats for a different prediction market. Defaults to "classic" if not provided

utterances.utterance: How accurate were the football predictions over the last 7 days?
Can you show me the prediction performance for the past 30 days in the UEFA federation?
What are the prediction stats for the last 14 days?
I'd like to see the prediction accuracy for the past day in the CONMEBOL federation.
Give me the performance stats for the last 7 days in the AFC federation.
What is the prediction performance for the last 30 days?
Show me the prediction accuracy for the past 14 days in the CAF federation.
How did the predictions perform over the last day in the OFC federation?
Can you provide the prediction stats for the last 7 days in the CONCACAF federation?
What are the prediction performance stats for the past 30 days in the classic market?

api_methods.name: Get list of fixture IDs
api_methods.description:
Returns a list of fixture IDs that can be used to make requests to endpoints expecting a ID url parameter.
Can be filtered by:

- iso_date
- market
- federation

utterances.utterance: Can you show me the list of upcoming football match fixtures?
I need the fixture IDs for the next football games.
What are the fixture IDs for the upcoming matches?
Give me the list of fixture IDs for the football matches happening soon.
Could you provide the fixture IDs for the upcoming football events?
List the fixture IDs for the next set of football matches.
I want to see the fixture IDs for the upcoming football games.
Fetch the fixture IDs for the upcoming football matches.

Can you list the fixture IDs for the next football matches?
